text:
I ordered a Pineapple Fried Rice $5 and added an egg $0.80 on 3 Sep 2024. When I collected my order, I saw some burnt bits on my fried egg so I removed them with my spoon on the spot. The stallowner Ms. Toom saw me doing it. Later, while I was eating halfway, imagine my surprise when she came up to me with a freshly fried egg in a bowl at no extra charge! Was so touched! ðŸ¥°

This stallowner has integrity and is very kind and friendly. I will definitely patronise her stall again! ðŸ˜Š

Ordered chicken drumstick noodle. When it came it was 5 drumlets, with some fried wanton skin and some ball (not sure what meat). Soup was like braised gravy, a bit on the salty side but a change from the usual Thai food in SG. There was plenty of fried lard pieces, and fried garlic too.
Ordered tom yum noodles for bfast. Lady was delivering top notch service. Generous portion and food was cooked from the base, did not use instant packs for broth like most stalls did.

Authentic Thai food at very affordable prices starting at $4 for a bowl of spicy sour pork noodles.

Portions are large for the price she charges.
Food was good and quick, portion was good as well but I had upset stomach the next day. Not sure related or not.
